select BUYLIST_DATE, PRODUCT_NAME, BUY_CNT, BUY_TOTALPRICE, PRODUCT_ID from BUYLISTVIEW
WHERE BUYLIST_DATE >= to_date(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND BUYLIST_DATE <= to_date(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')
